channel.title: King of the Map (Crossfire) - Black Mesa Tournament
channel.description:
Quick facts: * 1v1 Duel * Servers: Battle Arena * Timelimit 10, no fraglimit * Modus: Best of 1 Double Elimination * Mappool: pro_crossfire * Date/time: [b]June, 3rd 19:00 CEST (1:00 PM EDT; 3:00 AM AEST) - [url='https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/']https://www.worldtimebuddy.com[/url][/b] * Stream: Ch4mp * Skill level: any [b]Double Elimination[/b]
There will be a Winner Bracket and a Loser Bracket. If you lose a match, you will drop to the Loser Bracket and continue playing. If you lose again you are out of the tournament
[b]Prizes[/b]
for this very first tournament ever, no money prizes for now.
The winner gets: the title - King of the Map (Crossfire) Video on Youtube Mentioned here on ch4mp.com in the tournaments section Will be moved to the ArenaFPS Champs section on Discord
[b]Confirmed players[/b] 1. Dmx6 1. Deli Doctor 1. ZenoPopo 1. Demmon1 1. waveofbabies 1. Kng 1. Fury 1. Young_Alps [b]Sign up[/b]
If you want to play, reply to this topic or contact me and I will add you to the list. [url='https://discord.ch4mp.com/']https://discord.ch4mp.com[/url]
[url]https://ch4mp.com/forum/general/king-of-the-map-crossfire-black-mesa-tournament[/url]

item.title: King of the Map (Crossfire) - Black Mesa Tournament
item.dc:creator: Dmx6
item.description:
It was a great Tournement.

Maybe in future the Spectators can have a HUD too to view the Scores. Also the Names only refreshen when pressing Tab, that was fixed once but came back with the last update.
Also all Spectators were wearing Glocks, so Players saw floating Glocks in the Map

Many Players critised the bad Sounds, they couldnt hear the Steps from the Enemy, i have to agree with that.

Read full topic

item.source: King of the Map (Crossfire) - Black Mesa Tournament

item.title: King of the Map (Crossfire) - Black Mesa Tournament
item.dc:creator: fury
item.description:
hi. Can you add me to the list? I also have some recommendations about the rules of the tourney. I am the creator of dm_pro_crossfire and I also made a set of server settings to mimic HL1 gameplay more closely. This ruleset changes lots of gameplay variables. For example HL1 ammolimits, no respawn delay after death, more agile player movement with increased groundacceleration but slightly decreased maxspeed (300 instead of 320 ups max), increased jumphight to HL1 default, reduced longjump length to HL1 default, changed falldamage threshold to HL1 default, no trails on zoomed crossbow, adjusted weapon damage and wallgauss effectiveness… However… When I tested these settings on a online dedicated server with more than just 1 player, the server crashed (it was tested on a dedicated server of a guy called ‘HLTV’). I guess it had to do with the changed weapon settings. Anyway I would recommend to play the tournament with 20 minutes timelimit, no respawn delay, HL1 style threshold for falldamage, increased groundacceleration and 300 ups max, because it will give players enaugh time to make a comeback and turn the game around. The movement will feel more direct and will allow players to peek and dodge better. The falldamage and respawn changes will make the game more fast, more dynamic and more fair (since a gauss players usually take more falldamage than other players and faster respawn makes it harder for the in control player to keep control over all important items). Let me know what you think about it. I’ve been inactive for quite a while but it’s always fun to play some 1v1s on crossfire

Read full topic

item.title: King of the Map (Crossfire) - Black Mesa Tournament
item.dc:creator: Ch4mp
item.description:
Quick facts:

  • 1v1 Duel
  • Servers: Battle Arena
  • Timelimit 10, no fraglimit
  • Modus: Best of 1 Double Elimination
  • Mappool: pro_crossfire
  • Date/time: June, 3rd 19:00 CEST (1:00 PM EDT; 3:00 AM AEST) - https://www.worldtimebuddy.com
  • Stream: Ch4mp
  • Skill level: any
    Double Elimination

There will be a Winner Bracket and a Loser Bracket.
If you lose a match, you will drop to the Loser Bracket and continue playing.
If you lose again you are out of the tournament

Prizes

for this very first tournament ever, no money prizes for now.

The winner gets:
the title - King of the Map (Crossfire)
Video on Youtube
Mentioned here on ch4mp.com in the tournaments section
Will be moved to the ArenaFPS Champs section on Discord

Confirmed players

  1. Dmx6
  2. Deli Doctor
  3. ZenoPopo
  4. Demmon1
  5. waveofbabies
  6. Kng
  7. Fury
  8. Young_Alps
    Sign up

If you want to play, reply to this topic or contact me and I will add you to the list.
https://discord.ch4mp.com

https://ch4mp.com/forum/general/king-of-the-map-crossfire-black-mesa-tournament
